startScheduler

public void startScheduler(AcademicTerm academicTerm,
                           Department department)
                    throws DatabaseException
Starts the Scheduler concurrently.

The Configuration is initialized with respect to the given AcademicTerm and to the given Department.

If the given Configuration is scheduleable, a separate Thread executing the Scheduler is started, otherwise an error arises.

Parameters:
academicTerm - the AcademicTerm to be scheduled.
department - the Department to be scheduled.
Throws:
DatabaseException

stopScheduler

public void stopScheduler()
